tasks.label: Zip extension
tasks.command:
python3 - << 'PY'
import os, zipfile
base='.'
with zipfile.ZipFile('focus-leading-reader.zip','w',zipfile.ZIP_DEFLATED) as z:
  for root,_,files in os.walk(base):
    for fn in files:
      if root.startswith('./.vscode'): continue
      path=os.path.join(root,fn)
      z.write(path, os.path.relpath(path, base))
print('Created focus-leading-reader.zip')
PY
